meanings.sent1: After fixing the errors, the programmer recompiles the code.
meanings.sent2: She always recompiles her work to ensure it is error-free.
meanings.sent3: The computer felt proud when it recompiled the program flawlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed recompiles her efforts every day.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the compiler recompiling echoed through the room.

meanings.sent1: To update the software, the developer recompiles the code.
meanings.sent2: The program recompiles automatically after each change is made.
meanings.sent3: The computer seemed confused when asked to recompile the same code again.
meanings.sent4: The idea sparked a need to recompile the project from scratch.
meanings.sent5: The process of recompiling can sometimes reveal hidden bugs.
